meanings: one's homeland[fatherland, motherland], one's mother[native] country, (literary) one's native soil

vlive.korean: [파리에서 느끼는 고국의 향기] 근데 멋있네. [Feeling the mood of his motherland in Paris] But it's cool. 듣기 View video 포토피플(PHOTO PEOPLE) : Ep.03 연습벌레 김재중
vlive.english: [Feeling the mood of his motherland in Paris] But it's cool.

examples.korean: Jamaica is home to over two million people. 발음듣기 자마이카는 2백만이 넘는 사람들의 고국이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Jamaica is home to over two million people. 발음

examples.korean: It is a long time since he has visited his native Chile. 발음듣기 그가 고국 칠레를 방문한 지 오래되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It is a long time since he has visited his native Chile. 발음

examples.korean: She was pining for the mountains of her native country. 발음듣기 그녀는 고국의 산들을 몹시 그리워하고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was pining for the mountains of her native country. 발음

examples.korean: America, the land of the free and the home of the brave 발음듣기 자유로운 사람들의 땅이자 용기 있는 사람들의 고국인 미국 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: America, the land of the free and the home of the brave 발음

examples.korean: They had the advantage of playing before their home crowd. 발음듣기 그들은 고국[고향] 관중들이 지켜보는 가운데 경기를 하는 이점을 누렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They had the advantage of playing before their home crowd. 발음
